issue.title: [Python][C++][R][Doc] Add a general statement to dataset docs around the lack of ACID guarantees
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15070](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15070). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
None of our operations (multi-file or otherwise) make any sort of ACID guarantees.  While this is pretty typical for file readers it is probably worth noting in the dataset docs to avoid any assumption.
